node.doctext:
"Borg"ing prevents a noder from speaking in [Chatterbox] for a period of time. This time period lengthens with each successive /borg. The command is to be used at the discretion of members of the gods group, for example, when a noder is disruptive or antagonistic in Chatterbox.

To /borg a user, type /borg user_name in Chatterbox then click talk. You must replace any spaces in a noder's handle with an underscore (_). To /borg the noder "Flaming A-hole," type

/borg Flaming_A-hole

in Chatterbox, then click talk.

You can also borg a user by clicking the "/borg" link on a user's home node.

The current formula for borg time is 5min + 2min for each time they've been borged. Easily manipulated via the [the borg clinic] link in your epicenter. Also remember you Gods can escape borging with [nate's secret unborg doc]

Back to [God Powers and How to Use Them]
node.title: Borging users
